Html:
The Nature style has a maximum authors of 4. If you enter 5 authors it will be et al.

 

The problem is that on their website it states that it only counts for larger than 5.

 

http://www.nature.com/app_notes/nmeth/info/index.html

 

Thank you for the excellent job creating the style!!!

I'll upload an adjusted template somewhere next week.

For the moment, you can do it yourself. Just look for all occurences of the following line

<max_number_of_persons_to_display>4</max_number_of_persons_to_display>

and change the 4 into 5.
